level.heading: COMPLAINT RESOLUTION (§ 7-3216) A person who believes that any of the rights created by the Act has beenmproperly denied him or her may file a complaint with the Department ofmployment Services in the form and manner prescribed by the Director of theepartment. Complaints shall be investigated and resolved in an expeditious manneronsistent with the nature of the complaint. The Director shall make alleasonable efforts to resolve all complaints within forty-five (45) businessays of their filing and shall notify all parties if that time period cannot beet and shall make a good faith estimate of the expected resolution date.
